Cross Border Aerial Law Enforcement Operations Act
Cross Border Aerial Law Enforcement Operations Act

A bill to direct the Secretary of Homeland Security to negotiate with the Government of Canada regarding an agreement for integrated cross border aerial law enforcement operations, and for other purposes.
